Pricing & Promotions.Does Staples have a Price Match Guarante:
Yes, we do. If you find a lower price on a new identical item, just show us the lower price when you buy the item at Staples and we’ll match the price. Please read the following questions for full details.
If you purchase an item from Staples and tell us within 14 days that you found that item at a lower price in our stores or at staples.com®, we’ll refund the difference.
For an in-store price match, please see an associate at our customer service desk. This policy is subject to change without notice.
Pricing & Promotions.Which competitors will Staples price mat: Staples will price match items sold by any retailer who sells products in both retail stores and online under the same brand; we will also match those that are sold and shipped by Amazon.com. Marketplace products sold through any eligible competitor (e.g., products sold or shipped by a third party) are excluded.
Pricing & Promotions.Which items does Staples price match?: We price match almost everything we sell. The item must be identical, including model number, components and U.S. warranty. The item must be in stock and available for purchase at that price from an authorized U.S. reseller, whose authorization we reserve the right to verify. For wireless phones and other items with a service plan, the plan, provider and other terms must be the same.
Pricing & Promotions.Are there any items and services that ar:
We don’t price match competitors’ or our own local or special events (e.g., grand opening, anniversary, clearance, timed sales or liquidation sales, “Black Friday” or “Cyber Monday” sales).
The following products and services are excluded from our Price Match Guarantee: our Staples® EasyTechsm services, postage, gift and phone cards, and apps sold on the staples.com® App Center.
Also, we do not price match taxes, warranties, typographical errors, merchandise credits or contracted prices offered to Staples Advantage® customers.
Pricing & Promotions.How do Staples coupons and rebates contr:
When calculating a price match, we’ll deduct any available Staples coupons, Staples rebates (instant, easy or mail-in) and manufacturer rebates from the Staples price to arrive at a net price.
For example, if you buy an item from us for $100 and we offer a $20 instant rebate, the net price is $80. If another company’s price is $80 or more, we will not match the price.
Another example: If you buy an item from us for $159 and you have a $30 coupon, the net price is $129. If another company’s price is $125, your price match would be $4 off our net price of $129. Dollars-off coupons will be proportionally deducted from the prices of items in your order.
Pricing & Promotions.What does \"proration of coupons\" mean,:
Proration of coupons means that the dollars-off coupons (Staples coupons, rewards, gift checks) are proportionally deducted from the prices of items in an order.
The prorated discount from all coupons redeemed, excluding rewards, will be used when calculating Staples’ price. The application of coupons can mean a specific purchase won’t qualify for price match. Similarly, a purchase that has a price-match discount may no longer be eligible for a coupon if the adjusted order total no longer meets the coupon’s minimum requirements.
Pricing & Promotions.What happens if I buy something and then: If you purchase an item from Staples and tell us within 14 days that you found that item at a lower price in our stores or at staples.com, we’ll refund the difference. To claim a price match, please see an associate at our customer service desk at your local store or call us at 800-333-3330.
Pricing & Promotions.Will Staples match a competitor's price: If a competitor offers a product that comes with an instant rebate, mail-in rebate, gift check/gift card or similar discounts, we will not take these discounts into account. If a competitor offers a product that comes with a free or discounted item, and Staples does not carry the free or discounted item, we will only match the price you pay at the point of purchase, and will not take the free or discounted item into account.
Pricing & Promotions.Are delivery charges included in the pri:
It depends on whether your staples.com® order will receive free shipping, and whether the competitor’s order will offer free shipping:
If your staples.com order will receive free shipping and the competitor’s order will receive free shipping, we will price match the product without considering shipping charges.
If your staples.com order will receive free shipping and the competitor’s order will not receive free shipping, we will include an appropriate shipping charge in the competitor’s price before calculating the price match.
If your staples.com order will not receive free shipping, and the competitor's order will receive free shipping, we will deduct the Staples shipping charge from the competitor's price, so that the Staples price match item total is the same as the competitor’s price.
Pricing & Promotions.Are quantities limited on price-matched: Yes. We may limit the quantity we sell of the price-matched item, particularly if the other retailer has set a limit. In addition, we reserve the right to limit quantities sold to a customer.
Pricing & Promotions.How do I get a price match?: For an in-store price match, please see an associate at our customer service desk at your local store. For a price match on staples.com®, please call 800-333-3330.
Pricing & Promotions.Does Staples offer any gift-giving optio: Yes, we do. From TVs, computers and other electronics, to journals, sports memorabilia, jewelry and games, we have plenty of great gift options for nearly any occasion. And that's not even counting the large line of gift cards from merchants including AMC Theatres, the Cheesecake Factory and the Home Depot. If you need a gift, we have one for you.
Pricing & Promotions.Can I send an order to someone as a gift:
At this time, we are not able to accommodate requests to change the packing slips that are sent with orders. The packing slip will list the items, quantity and price paid.
If you'd prefer to send an order without a packing slip, you can have your order delivered to yourself. Then you can bring it to one of our stores and take advantage of our full line of reasonably priced packing and shipping services to have it delivered to the recipient.
Pricing & Promotions.How do I buy Staples® gift cards?: Staples gift cards are available in all Staples retail stores and online in denominations of $25, $50, $75 and $100.
Pricing & Promotions.Where can I use my gift card?:
Gift cards are valid only at the retailer/service provider listed on the card. Prepaid cards cannot be redeemed for cash. Specific terms and conditions are included with each card.
You can use your Staples® gift card in all Staples retail stores in the U.S and on staples.com®. There’s no expiration date, and you won’t be charged any service fees. Following each purchase, your receipt will show the remaining balance on the card. Value can be added to this card at any Staples U.S. retail store.
Gift cards cannot be used for credit card payments or to purchase other gift cards (including Staples gift cards) or wireless cards. No more than five cards may be used for any single purchase. Cards may not be consolidated.
For more information about Staples gift cards, you can also visit www.staples.com/giftcards.
Pricing & Promotions.Are eGift Cards available?: Yes. With an eGift Card, you can customize the design and amount, and have the gift delivered right to your recipient's email inbox.
Pricing & Promotions.Do I need to print my eGift Card in colo: No, you do not need to print in color. The most important thing is that the card number is clear. If it's not, you may need to install a new ink cartridge. (Need to restock? We can help with that.)
Pricing & Promotions.Is there a limit to how many times I can: You can print as many times as you need to; the value of the eGift Card is tied to the gift card number, not the printout. When that number is used, the value of the purchase is deducted from the eGift Card. That means you should safeguard your eGift Card for your own protection. If someone makes a copy of your eGift Card and redeems it for the full amount, your copy will have no value.
Pricing & Promotions.What if I lose my gift card?: Your gift card has cash value and should be safeguarded as such. If you lose your gift card, or a printed copy of your eGift Card, contact us immediately. If your eGift Card has not been redeemed or has some remaining value, we can cancel the original and issue you a new eGift Card for that value.
Pricing & Promotions.How do I check the balance on my Staples: Easy! If you’d like to see how much is left on your gift card, click here. Under Gift Cards (or eGift Cards if yours was sent via email), click the link that says “View card balance.”
Pricing & Promotions.How do I redeem a rebate offer?:
There are two ways to redeem a rebate offer:
Staples® Easy Rebates®
Now you can submit most rebates online — no clipping, no mailing, no hassles. Easy Rebates are available on products purchased in Staples stores, through our catalog and online at staples.com.
Look for Easy Rebate products every time you shop. They're identified by the phrase "Easy Rebate" in the product description. When you're ready to submit your Easy Rebate, go to www.stapleseasyrebates.com and enter the required information right online. You won't have to clip out UPC codes or mail in receipts. You'll even receive emails keeping you posted on your rebate status, with links to the Track Status page online. Best of all, you'll receive your rebate faster than ever — within 4 to 6 weeks.
Note: Certain products, including most software titles, are not eligible for online submission. Any products excluded from the online submission process will be advertised as qualifying for a "mail-in rebate" versus an "Easy Rebate."
Mail-In Rebates
Mail-in rebates are easy to redeem too. You can find and print rebate forms, and even track the status of your mail-in rebates, at www.stapleseasyrebates.com.
Because many rebate offers require original sales receipts and rebate forms, it's important to make copies of both and keep them with your records. Should a problem arise with your rebate redemption, having these copies will make it easy for us to resolve the issue.
If you purchased a rebate item through our catalog or at staples.com and a receipt is required as Proof of Purchase, you should use the packing slip that was included in your order as your receipt.
If you have questions about your rebate, please call 877-266-6483 Monday through Friday 7:00 am to 12:00 am ET, Saturday 8:00 am to 12:00 am ET, and Sunday 10:00 am to 12:00 am ET.
Pricing & Promotions.Will using Staples Easy Rebates allow me: Some manufacturers tell customers they must wait 8 to 14 weeks to receive their rebate. But with Staples Easy Rebates, you'll receive your rebate 4 to 6 weeks after you submit it — or maybe even sooner than that. (Note: During the holiday seasons, rebates usually take 6 to 8 weeks.)
Pricing & Promotions.I lost my sales receipt. Can I still get: For a mail-in rebate, in most cases all you'll need is your rebate redemption form. See details of the specific rebate for more information. With Staples Easy Rebates, the vast majority of rebates do not require a sales receipt. You will, however, need your rebate redemption form for a retail purchase or your packing slip for an online or delivery purchase.
Pricing & Promotions.When submitting an Easy Rebate, can I su: Yes you can. There's no limit on how many rebates you can submit at one time. After you've finished entering the first rebate, you'll be asked whether you have additional rebate offers to submit.
Pricing & Promotions.I bought two (or more) items that fall u: If you purchased multiples of the same product with a rebate or if you purchased multiple items that fall under the same rebate offer number, you only need to enter the rebate offer number once. The system will use your Easy Rebate ID number or order number to verify the rebate products you purchased. Then it will update your status to reflect the multiple rebates.
Pricing & Promotions.If I take advantage of the Staples Price: In most cases, yes. However, you need to check the terms and conditions of the rebate to see if there is a minimum purchase price requirement. If there is a minimum and the Price-Match Guarantee brings you below that price, you will not be eligible for the rebate.
Pricing & Promotions.Where is my rebate?: It's easy to track your rebates. Just visit www.stapleseasyrebates.com, and choose whether yours was a mail-in or Easy Rebate under the heading “Where is my rebate?”

Payment Information.Why is sales tax added to my order?: Where Staples has a business "presence,” we are required to collect sales tax. As obligated, Staples charges sales tax on orders for taxable items in accordance with state and local tax laws.
Payment Information.How is sales tax calculated?: Staples charges sales tax on orders for taxable items in accordance with applicable state and local tax laws. The amount of sales tax charged depends on several factors, including the item purchased, the destination of the order and, where applicable, the location from which your order is shipped. During the checkout process, the order confirmation and packing slip will reflect the estimated sales tax. Please be advised that the estimated sales tax may differ from the final amount charged for your order.
Payment Information.How do I obtain a Staples Tax-Exempt Cus:
If you are a tax-exempt organization and do not have a Staples Tax-Exempt Customer Number, please follow these steps:
Step 1: Fax your tax certificate to Staples at 888-823-8503.
Step 2: On a cover sheet, please include your telephone number and order number if applicable. Please do not write on your tax certificate.
Step 3: Your order will be taxed and a refund generated as soon as our Tax Exempt team verifies your tax-exempt information. Please let us know if you have any questions.
Payment Information.How do I use my tax-exempt number?:
If you’ve sent our Tax-Exempt team a copy of your tax certificate and received a tax-exempt number, then tax will be waived automatically at checkout.
If you are a new tax-exempt customer, you can fax, mail or email your tax certificate to us. Include your telephone number and order number, if applicable. Your order will be taxed, but a refund will be generated as soon as we've received approval from our tax department.
Send faxes to 888-823-8503.
Emails can be sent to taxexempt@staples.com.
Certificates mailed by postal service should be sent to: Staples, Inc. Attn: Tax Department 300 Arbor Lake Dr. Columbia, SC 29223
Payment Information.What methods of payment does staples.com:
We currently accept Staples® Credit Cards, Visa, MasterCard, Discover, AmericanExpress, gift cards and checks. We accept single or multiple methods of payment on your purchases online and at the kiosk. Staples maintains reasonable and appropriate standards to safeguard your Personal Information. We cannot accept cards issued outside the United States.
Delivery orders may be placed at a kiosk and paid for in our stores. For these orders, we accept payment via cash, gift card, check, and credit and debit cards at the register.
Service offerings cannot be purchased on staples.com®. They can only be bought in stores. Copy & Print services can be purchased with cash, gift card, check, and credit and debit cards. All others can only be paid for with a credit card.
Gift cards may not be used to purchase other gift cards.
Downloadable software has a single method of payment option only and excludes the use of gift cards as payment.
Payment Information.How do I redeem a coupon on staples.com®:
Get more savings on our already great prices with weekly Staples® printable coupons.
You can add coupons to your shopping cart at anytime. Here’s how:
Step 1: Click on your cart in the top right-hand corner
Step 2: Click the "Add/Edit Coupons" button at the bottom of the page
Step 3: Enter your coupon code and click "Add Coupon"
Step 4: Click "Back to My Order" to return to your cart
We offer two types of coupons: (1) Coupons that provide a discount on your overall order or transaction (called transaction coupons); (2) Coupons that provide a discount on a specific product, including coupons that provide a discount on the highest priced item purchased (called product coupons).
 Please note these limitations for transaction and product coupons:

Limit one transaction coupon per purchase.
Any minimum purchase requirement for transaction coupons must be met with regular priced product to which no other coupon or instant savings offer applies. Products discounted by Staples.com automatically added coupons or instant savings will not be eligible for use with transaction coupons.
Highest Priced Item transaction coupons provide a discount on the highest, regular priced product in your order total.
Product coupons must be met with regular priced product to which no other coupon or instant savings offer applies. Products discounted by Staples.com automatically added coupons or instant savings will not be eligible for use with product coupons.
Staples Rewards® can be redeemed on any order.
Both transaction and product coupons are not valid on desktop or laptop computers; tablets; netbooks; Apple® products; Bose® products; Amazon Kindle®; NOOK®; HP ink and toner; Epson® ink and toner; gift cards; mobile phones and mobile phone services; Staples® EasyTech℠ professional-grade and on-site services; business service provider or custom-printing service provider Web sites; daily deals; phone cards; and postage stamps. 

Other restrictions: Coupons not transferable. Coupons may only be used once and cannot be used on subsequent orders. Please observe the coupon limits on particular offers. Ten coupon maximum for any single order. Void where prohibited. No cash or credit back. Coupon must be submitted at time of order. Expired coupons not valid. Competitors’ and manufacturers' coupons not valid. Limit one per customer. Tax and delivery not included in calculating minimum purchase requirement. Coupons not valid on previous purchases or purchases made with Staples® Procurement or Convenience Cards. Single-time usage of Visa Coupon will not be included in shipping threshold calulculation.
Note: We reserve the right to reject orders that use a coupon code that was obtained from a bulletin board or other Internet site, transferred from a direct mail recipient, or that are in violation of any restrictions listed above. We reserve the right to charge the customer’s credit card for the amount of any disallowed coupon.
Payment Information.How many coupons can I use at one time?: There is a 10-coupon maximum for any single order.
Payment Information.I used a coupon on my order. Why was it: Unless a coupon specifically applies to a particular item, its value may be proportionally distributed to all items purchased. You still get the same value off, whether it’s a percentage or a specific dollar amount, but it’s applied appropriately to all the items in your order.
Payment Information.I forgot to add a coupon to my order. Is: No, it’s not. As long as you contact our customer service team within two days of placing your order, we can apply the discount to your order. However, if yours is a Staples Rewards® coupon, we can only apply it at the time of your order and cannot do so later.
Payment Information.How do I use my P.O.s for ordering?: If you normally use Purchase Orders to pay for your office supplies, you must set up a revolving credit account with us. Fill out an application here. You may also use a major credit card — MasterCard, American Express, Visa or Discover — to pay for your order. Purchase Order numbers can be entered at the Payment Information screen when you place your order or on the Review Order page. Please note that the Purchase Order number is for your records only. It will be referenced on your packing slip to make your record keeping easier.
Payment Information.I am a Staples Advantage® customer. Can: You’re more than welcome to make personal purchases at staples.com®, but to receive the benefits of being a Staples Advantage customer, you should make purchases via your usual ordering platform. Staples Advantage has several eCommerce solutions available. If you’re interested in learning more, visit the Web site.
Payment Information.Can I get a discount if I order large qu:
Buy in large quantities and you can save even more. Simply call 800-315-2724 to see if you qualify for a volume discount.
Fax your bid proposal to 877-638-6779, or mail your proposal to: Staples Business Delivery® Attention: Large Quantity Group, P.O Box 9253, Framingham, MA 01701.
Payment Information.Can I \"link\" my Staples customer numbe: Yes, you can link your Staples customer numbers together by simply calling 800-333-3330. We recommend that you choose one customer number and use it going forward for all communications with Staples, including Web site and phone orders.
Payment Information.What is Visa Checkout?:
Visa Checkout offers an easier way to pay with your card online, from the company you know and trust. Here are some of the advantages:

Speed through checkout with a single login
Store and use any major credit or debit card
No need to re-enter your card and address whenever you see Visa Checkout
Payment Information.Terms & Conditions for Visa Checkout Cou: Limited time offer. Valid online at staples.com when you pay with Visa Checkout only. Not valid in store. Limit one coupon per customer, nontransferable. Minimum purchase requirement of $200.  Tax and shipping not included in calculating the minimum purchase. No cash/credit back. Not valid on any Beats, Bose, Canon ink, Epson ink and toner, HP ink and toner, JBL, Roku, SquareTrade warranties, Staples Industrial(sm) purchases, Steelcase, custom printing orders placed online, services, promotional products, gift cards, prior purchases or any purchases on other provider Web sites. Expires 7/24/15 or when promotional redemption limit has been reached.

Placing & Canceling Orders.Is my Staples purchase guaranteed?: If you're not 100% satisfied with your Staples purchase, you can return it for any reason, or exchange it for another item.
Placing & Canceling Orders.Is there a difference between purchasing:
We want you to have the same easy shopping experience, whether you're in one of our stores or browsing our Web site. While we do have a larger product offering online, you can access it at one of the kiosks in any of our retail stores.
In addition, prices in Staples stores and on staples.com® may vary. We will match any difference in price that you notice between our retail stores and online.
Placing & Canceling Orders.Are there any options for making a purch: In addition to a mobile-friendly version of our Web site (http://m.staples.com), Staples now has a mobile app, available for both the iPhone® and devices running the Android™ operating system. The Staples mobile app lets you redeem coupons and rewards, compare product prices and features, scan a bar code to check product availability, view your order history and update shopping lists.
Placing & Canceling Orders.I tend to buy the same things. Can I cre:
You sure can. If there are items you buy regularly, add them to your Favorites List so you don't have to search for them every time you shop on staples.com®. To add an item to your Favorites List, find it on the Web site, then click the “Add to Favorites” option below “Add to Cart.” (If you have not yet logged in, you will be asked to do so.)
You can also take advantage of our Easy Reorder feature, which lets you resubmit an order you've placed in the past if you need to replenish your supply.
Placing & Canceling Orders.Can I place an item on hold without purc: If you see an item you want, you can add it to your shopping cart without committing to a purchase. This does not put the item on hold, but it ensures you'll have easy access to it when you go to check out. If you decide you no longer want an item and would like to delete it from your shopping cart, simply click “Remove Item.”
Placing & Canceling Orders.How do I use my Staples Rewards® number:
Your Staples Rewards number can be used when placing an order for products on staples.com®. You can add your Staples Rewards number to your account by taking the following steps:
Step 1: Click My Account from the home page and go to My Profile.
Step 2: Click Edit on the line that says Staples Rewards® Member Number.
Step 3: Enter your Staples Rewards number and press Save Account.
If you do not have an existing account on staples.com but do have a Staples Rewards number, you'll need to follow these steps:
Step 1: Click Your Account on the top right corner of the home page.
Step 2: Click Start Here to create a new account.
Step 3: Enter your Staples Rewards number in the field provided and click Continue.
When you add your Staples Rewards number to your account, it will automatically be added whenever you make a purchase at staples.com. Please note: Purchases made on Staples Business Services do not count toward Staples Rewards®.
Placing & Canceling Orders.How do I check what's currently in my sh: At the top right-hand corner of staples.com® is a yellow box with a picture of a shopping cart. Clicking this will show you what you've selected for purchase.
Placing & Canceling Orders.If staples.com® crashes, what happens to:
If the Web site crashes while you're still placing items in your basket, those items should still be in your shopping cart when you return to the site if you're a registered user or your browser accepts cookies.
If the Web site crashes when you're authorizing an order, you should return to the site and submit it again. Don't worry about duplicating your order; our Internet associates check for that. If we have questions about whether or not your order is duplicated, we'll contact you by phone or email.
If you're accessing staples.com from an in-store kiosk when your order is interrupted or you're logged out, you'll need to sign in again and return to your shopping cart, then proceed from there.
Placing & Canceling Orders.I'm paying for my order with a Visa® pre: We recommend that you hold on to your card until after you receive your order, as the refund for any return that you may require is applied back to the original method of payment used on the order.
Placing & Canceling Orders.How do I check if an item is available i:
If an item is available in stores, we will let you know on that product's page. Click the "Change" link to check availability at another Staples retail store near you.
Some items will be available for in-store delivery. Click on the "Learn More" link next to the "Free Shipping to Store" callout on the product page for details.
Please note: Prices in Staples stores and on staples.com® may vary. We will match any difference in price that you notice between our retail stores and online. Availability is not guaranteed and is subject to change.
Placing & Canceling Orders.What if an item I want to buy is out of: Sorry we're out of what you're looking for, but don't worry. Our Product Concierges are always ready to assist you with selecting an acceptable substitute; fill out this quick form to let them know what you're looking for. If you're set on a particular item, know that we're always restocking our inventory, so please check back soon.
Placing & Canceling Orders.When I place an order with staples.com®,:
Staples.com will automatically let you know if an item is out of stock when you attempt to add it to your cart. We will also recommend alternative products in the event that we are out of stock in your area. In case of an out-of-stock situation, our Call Center Associates are also always ready to assist you with selecting an acceptable substitute.
In the rare instance that an item becomes out of stock after you've placed an order, we'll notify you promptly.
Placing & Canceling Orders.How do I check the status of my order?:
After you place an order and it has been processed for delivery, you'll receive a confirmation email. The confirmation will contain the expected delivery date, your shipping address, your order number and any other relevant information.
The receipt of an email order confirmation is recognition that we have received your requested order and does not constitute an offer to sell.
You can also check the most current order status. To check the delivery status of your order, click on the Order Status page and then provide your order number and zip code. Or, if you're logged in to staples.com®, click on "Order Status" and select the appropriate order for tracking information. If we need your help to resolve any problems with your order, we'll contact you by phone. If we can't reach you right away, we'll contact you by email.
Note, the Order Status information for staples.com orders, catalog orders and Staples® Ship Center Orders does not necessarily represent the final order — especially if any changes were made due to product availability, credit card authorization, tax and coupons. This information should be used only for your own reference. It cannot be used for tax or billing purposes.
If we become aware of any issues with your order, you'll be contacted by a Customer Service Representative.
Placing & Canceling Orders.What if I forget my order number?: Your order number is included in your Order Confirmation email with an automatic link to your order status on staples.com®. When you order by phone, an associate will give you your order number. It's a good idea to save your Order Confirmation email or write down the order number for future reference. If you forget or misplace your order number, you can get it by contacting Customer Service via email at support@orders.staples.com.
Placing & Canceling Orders.How will I know whether my order has bee:
When you place your order on the Internet, your credit card is not "billed" until your order is actually shipped from our warehouse. Most orders are approved for credit; if there are any problems, our credit department will attempt to get approval from your credit card provider first, without calling you. Otherwise, the credit department will call you and let you know as soon as possible so you can decide on another method of payment.
If you've ordered on staples.com® in a store and paid at the register, your credit card will be billed immediately.
Placing & Canceling Orders.How do I get in touch with Staples if I: Please send us an email or call us at 800-333-3330 if you need assistance with your order.
Placing & Canceling Orders.How long do you keep my order status his: Your Order Status history goes back 90 days and reflects any order that was placed on staples.com®, via the phone or at one of our in-store kiosks under your Staples customer number, Staples Rewards® number or Staples-issued tax-exempt number.
Placing & Canceling Orders.I placed a Staples order via Google on m: Your Staples order confirmation will be emailed to you within 4 hours of placing your order during regular business hours Monday–Friday (9:00 am–5:00 pm EST). If you placed your order after regular business hours Monday–Friday, or over the weekend, your order confirmation will be emailed the next business day.
The tax and delivery charge on your Google confirmation are estimated amounts only. Your Staples order confirmation reflects the final charges for your order.
Placing & Canceling Orders.What if I placed my order with the incor: Call us right away at 800-333-3330, or send us an email. Most orders are transmitted almost immediately to our warehouses, so we'll do what we can to make sure your items make it to the correct destination.
Placing & Canceling Orders.How do I cancel an order?: Orders are transmitted almost immediately to our warehouses, where they are processed and shipped out.  If you change your mind after placing an order, you can process a return online, once you receive your order.  To do this, log in - go to "My Orders" - find the order containing the item you want to return - click "Return an Item” and follow the simple return instructions.  If you have more questions, Click Here
Placing & Canceling Orders.I placed a Staples order via Google on m: Orders are transmitted almost immediately to our warehouses to be processed and shipped out. If you change your mind after the order has already been transmitted to the warehouse, you can process a return online once you’ve received the order. Simply hover over “Need Help?” located in the page header above, then click on “Return an Item.” You may also contact Staples Customer Service at 800-333-3330.

Shipping & Delivery.How will I know whether my order has bee: When you place an order on staples.com, we'll send you an email confirmation to let you know when it's been shipped and is headed on its way to you.
Shipping & Delivery.How can I check on my order's delivery s:
To check the delivery status of your order, visit the Order Status page on staples.com and type in your order number and zip code. You can also log into staples.com, click on "Track Order" in the top right corner of the page and select the appropriate order for tracking information. We cannot determine exact delivery time, but we can tell you if your order has been shipped, and whether any problems with it have been reported to us.
Note: An extra day may be added onto delivery for staples.com orders that have been paid for in a Staples retail store at the register, due to order processing in the store.
For more specific delivery details, please refer to your order.
Shipping & Delivery.What does it mean when I'm told my order:
Processing means we've received your order and are in the process of filling it.
Shipped means we've filled this portion of your order. It's on the delivery truck and will be delivered soon.
Item(s) Not Available means this portion of your order was not filled. A Customer Service Representative from Staples will be contacting you with more details.
Canceled means the order was canceled by either the customer or by Staples. A Customer Service Representative from Staples will be contacting you with more details.
Shipping from Store means your order is being filled and shipped from a local Staples retail store in your geographic area. (This option has limited availability at this time.)
Shipping & Delivery.I won't be available to accept my delive:
If you've already placed an order with us, we may be able to reschedule your order for a different delivery day that's more convenient for you. Please chat with us or call us as soon as possible at 800-333-3330 to speak with a member of our customer service team. However, if you would like the driver to leave your products (e.g., on the front steps), please fill out the Driver Release Agreement. The driver must take the note as proof of authorization. If you don't post a Driver Release Agreement, the driver will decide whether or not to leave the order unattended.
If the delivery cannot be made, your order will be returned to the local delivery center and another attempt will be made.
Shipping & Delivery.What if I don't receive my order by the: If you don't receive your order by 5:00 pm on the scheduled delivery date, let us know. Keep in mind that UPS may deliver to residential addresses until 7:00 pm.
Shipping & Delivery.What do I do if I forget my UPS tracking: If you're a Staples Ship Center customer, you'll be given your UPS Tracking Number when you ship your order from the Staples retail store. If you forget or misplace your UPS Tracking Number, call the Staples retail store from where you shipped your package.
Shipping & Delivery.How long will it take for my order to be:
We'll provide you with an estimated delivery date when you place your order. Estimated delivery dates vary due to carrier shipping practices, delivery location and the items you order. When we use independent carriers to deliver orders, we base the estimated delivery dates upon information provided to us by the independent carriers. Products may be delivered in separate shipments.
We deliver between the hours of 9:00 am and 5:00 pm, Monday through Friday, excluding holidays. We cannot determine your exact delivery time, but we can tell you if your order has been shipped, and whether or not there are any problems with it that have been reported to us that could delay delivery. To check the delivery status of your order, visit the Order Status page on staples.com and type in your order number and zip code.
If you've purchased a software download, your order will be fulfilled via a separate email confirmation. This email will include download links and instructions on how to complete the download.
Delivery dates noted apply to orders placed by 5:00 pm local time (or 4:00 pm local time in stores and in limited locations across the country) and where credit approval and product availability are confirmed by 5:00 pm on the same business day that the order is placed. (Business days are defined as Monday through Friday, except holidays.) Items shipped direct from the vendor may require an earlier order placement time. You will be notified of the estimated delivery date in a confirmation email. (Not available for in-store orders if email address is not submitted.)
Note: An extra day may be added onto delivery for staples.com orders that have been paid for in a Staples retail store at the register, due to order processing in the store.
For more specific delivery details, please refer to your order.
Shipping & Delivery.Can I get my order delivered today?: We do not offer same-day delivery at this time. If you need an order today, we suggest visiting one of our retail stores.
Shipping & Delivery.Do I have to wait at my house or office: For your security and protection, it's best to have someone available to sign for your order between the hours of 9:00 am and 5:00 pm, Monday through Friday, excluding holidays. Our drivers' delivery routes change from day to day so there is no way to determine the exact time your order will be delivered. If you'd like the driver to leave your shipment (on the front steps, for example), you need to fill out the Driver Release Agreement. If you don't post a Driver Release Agreement, the driver will decide whether or not to leave the order unattended. If the delivery cannot be made, your order will be returned to the local delivery center and another attempt will be made.
Shipping & Delivery.What time can I expect my order to be de: In most cases, our drivers deliver orders between the hours of 9:00 am and 5:00 pm, Monday through Friday, excluding holidays. Since our drivers' delivery routes change from day to day, we cannot determine an approximate time your order will be delivered.
Shipping & Delivery.Can I specify a delivery dateime for my:
We are unable to specify a particular time for your order to be delivered.

Office supply orders: Items stocked in a Staples warehouse can generally be delivered any weekday.
Furniture orders: Delivery date changes cannot be guaranteed, however, we will do our best to accommodate your request. This request will require approval from the local delivery manager pending regular furniture delivery schedules for your area.

Note: Products not stocked in a Staples warehouse are unable to have a specific delivery date assigned to them.
Shipping & Delivery.I'm buying furniture. Can Staples assemb: Staples offers assembly only on select products. Please check the product page to see if White Glove™ service is included with your purchase.
Shipping & Delivery.When will my furniture order be delivere: Most furniture orders are available for next-business-day delivery, between 9:00 am and 5:00 pm, Monday through Friday, excluding holidays, as defined by region and availability. We'll notify you if there's an exception. When you place your order, you'll be informed of your delivery day, or you can contact us for the furniture delivery days in your area.
Shipping & Delivery.What is your delivery policy?:
An estimated delivery date will be provided after your order is placed. These dates vary due to carrier shipping practices, delivery location and the items you order. Products may be delivered in separate shipments.
Delivery dates noted apply to orders placed by 5:00 pm local time (or 4:00 pm local time in stores and in limited locations across the country) and where credit approval and product availability are confirmed by 5:00 pm on the same business day that the order is placed. (Note: Business days are defined as Monday through Friday, except holidays.) Items shipped direct from the vendor may require an earlier order placement time. You will be notified of the estimated delivery date in a confirmation email. (Not available for in-store orders unless email address is submitted.) Orders cannot be expedited.
Staples® catalog, Web site and U.S. retail businesses are operated within the contiguous United States for customers within the U.S. and therefore do not ship or bill to international addresses. (For more about shopping internationally, click here.) Staples delivers to street addresses (not P.O. Boxes or APO/FPO) in the contiguous United States only.
Certain Staples items originate directly from carefully selected vendors and manufacturers. In many instances, delivery personnel will deliver your order to your entrance. Other items are prestocked at warehouses around the country and delivered by a common carrier. For these items, a loading dock is needed. If one is not available, delivery personnel will bring your order to the tailgate of the truck; you will be responsible for unloading the items and bringing them into your building.
Shipping & Delivery.What are my delivery options?: You can have your items delivered to your home or office, or you can have them delivered to one of our Staples retail stores, where you can pick them up.
Shipping & Delivery.How much does it cost to have something:
Free delivery is available for:

orders placed by Staples Rewards® members on orders over $14.99 (excludes oversize items);
orders placed on the in-store kiosk;
orders of $49.99 or more (excludes Oversize and Add-On Items); and
orders that include ink, toner and/or case paper.

You can also have your order delivered to one of our retail stores for no charge.
However, free delivery is not available for orders placed on documents.staples.com, print.staples.com, staplespromotionalproducts.com, design.staples.com, create.staples.com, 3dservices.staples.com, directmail.staples.com, holidaycards.staples.com, and third party websites linked to staples.com.
Orders under $49.99 are charged a $9.95 delivery fee.
Orders are subject to credit approval and product availability, and cannot be expedited.
Shipping & Delivery.What is an Oversize Item?: Oversize Items are items which weigh 100 pounds or more (excluding packaging) and which are identified as Oversize Items on the individual product page. A fee of $14.99 will be charged for delivery of Oversize Items.
Shipping & Delivery.What is an Add-on Item?: Add-on Items are items with a regular price of $10 or less and which are identified as Add-on Items on the individual product page.  Orders for Add-on Items will only be processed if the total order amount is $25 or more (after application of all coupons and other discounts, and excluding taxes and delivery charges).
Shipping & Delivery.Can I purchase multiple items at the sam: Unfortunately, no. That said, we might ship your items separately based on availability, or if they're coming from multiple suppliers. If you don't want all your items at the same time, we suggest putting in separate orders.
Shipping & Delivery.I live right near a Staples Retail store: While Staples does not deliver products directly from the store, we provide fast and free delivery when you order at the in-store kiosk, when you order on the phone or when you place an order of $49.99 or more (excluding Oversize Items).  The order is shipped pending credit approval and product availability. You will be advised of the expected date of delivery at the time you place your order.
Shipping & Delivery.Can I place an order online and pick it:
Yes you can. From the product page, click on the "Pick Up Today" button. (Note: Not every item sold in Staples stores and on staples.com is available for Pick Up in Store.) If you are not already logged in to staples.com, enter your zip code to find the nearest store where the item is available for pickup. Using the drop-down menu, select the quantity you wish to pickup next to the store, then Pick Up in Store Today. (If an item is unavailable or stock is low, it will be marked as such and you will not be able to order. Stock levels vary by store.)
During the checkout process, your order will be sent to the store you selected. After a store associate has picked your item(s), you will receive a "Ready for Pick Up" email letting you know when your order is ready to be picked up. (Online items will be ready for pickup within two hours of the store receiving your request. If the order is submitted within two hours of the store’s closing time, your items will be available within two hours of the store’s opening time on the next day.) Store hours may vary. Check our store locator for your store's hours of operation.
Please bring a copy of the email and a valid form of identification to the EasyTech Counter/Customer Service Desk, or just look for the Online Order Pick Up Sign and see an associate. Please be sure to have your printed "Ready for Pickup" email, which contains your order number and bar code.
Shipping & Delivery.How do I check if an item is available i:
If an item is available in stores, we will let you know on that product's page. Click the "Change" link to check availability at another Staples retail store near you.
Some items will be available for in-store delivery. Click on the "Learn More" link next to the "Free Shipping to Store" callout on the product page for details.
Please note: Prices in Staples stores and on staples.com® may vary. We will match any difference in price that you notice between our retail stores and online. Availability is not guaranteed and is subject to change.
Shipping & Delivery.Does Staples deliver to \"Mail Drop\" lo: A Mail Drop location is an address where a business or service accepts mail deliveries on behalf of a customer. Staples will deliver to Mail Drop locations such as a UPS® store (formerly Mail Boxes Etc.). However, Staples is unable to deliver to P.O. Boxes, prisons or APO/FPO addresses, which are military overseas mail drops.
Shipping & Delivery.Why do I have to notify American Express:
This is a policy from American Express that must be adhered to both by Staples and American Express customers. It is done to protect you from fraudulent use of your credit card account. It is in your best interest to call American Express and notify them of your other delivery address so your order can be authorized and shipped to you as quickly as possible.
If you do not call AMEX to notify them that you are using a different shipping address for an order, your order may be delayed. Our Credit Department will place the order on hold and call the billing contact for the AMEX card. If the billing contact person cannot be reached to verify the order, your order may be delayed.
Shipping & Delivery.Can I just pay the driver for my order?: At this time, we do not accept C.O.D. orders.
Shipping & Delivery.Can I place an order on staples.com for:
Staples catalog, Web site and U.S. retail businesses are operated within the contiguous U.S. for customers within the U.S. and therefore do not ship or bill to international addresses. Staples only delivers to street addresses (not P.O. Boxes or APO/FPO) in the contiguous United States.
If you're in another country and you'd like to have your order delivered there, visit the appropriate site for Staples in Canada, across Europe and in Australia. You can see all our other international locations here.
Shipping & Delivery.What happens if my item arrived and it w: We apologize for that inconvenience. Click here to learn about your options for returning an item. And don't worry: If you're returning a defective item, we'll refund your shipping charges.

Managing My Account.Why should I sign up for a staples.com®: With a staples.com account, you'll get more personalized service on the Web site and your shopping experience will be even easier. For example, you can establish a Favorites List of items you buy most often so you don't have to keep searching for them every time. You can speed up the checkout process because we'll remember your preferred payment options for you. And you can submit product reviews and be a part of the staples.com customer community, called the Boardroom.
Managing My Account.How do I create a staples.com account?: It's easy: Just make a purchase, or click here to fill out the brief registration form.
Managing My Account.How do I update my delivery address, cre: Just log in to your account, select the My Profile option, and update your information.
Managing My Account.How do I unsubscribe or remove myself fr:
If you no longer want to receive special offers by email, you can remove your email address from our list at any time in one of two ways:
Option 1:

Click on the Unsubscribe link located at the bottom of every promotional email

Option 2:

Log in to your staples.com® account
Click on Your Account
Click on My Profile
Under the category "Receive special savings by email," click Unsubscribe
Check the box to remove yourself from the staples.com email list and then click Submit

Please allow up to 10 business days for changes to take effect.

You can request to be removed from our mailing lists by following any of these steps:


Write to us at:
Staples Business DeliveryMarketing Services500 Staples DriveFramingham, MA 01702

Fax us the back page of your Staples Business Delivery Catalog (with your instructions to be removed on it) toll-free at 877-333-0398
Fill out our Web-based form

(To obtain information about having your name and home address removed from marketing lists on a national basis, you may contact the Direct Marketing Association at DMAchoice.org.)

To stop our text deals alerts, just send a text message that says STOP to the short code 555-444.
You will be removed from all Staples SMS programs after a one-time cancel confirmation, and won’t receive any future messages after that unless you opt back in.
Read our full Mobile Terms and Conditions here. If you have any additional questions, you can send a text message from your mobile phone with the word HELP to 555-444 at any time, or call us at 800-333-3330.
Managing My Account.What if I forget my password?: Just click here. We'll reset your password immediately and send you an email with instructions for choosing a new one.
Managing My Account.What makes a good password?:
A good password is one that you'll remember and that won't be easy for others to figure out. Some tips:

A combination of letters and numbers is ideal — even better if you mix upper case and lower case letters
Don't just use a sequence of letters or numbers (e.g., 12345678 or zyxwvuts)
Don't use your name, your username or your company name
Stay away from numbers like your birth date

If you need to, write down your password and keep it in a safe place so you don't forget it.
Managing My Account.Does Staples offer a credit card or any: Yes we do. The Staples Credit Center offers multiple payment options to best meet your business or home needs.
Managing My Account.If I have a Staples Credit Card is the n: No. Your credit card account and customer account numbers are different.
Managing My Account.When will my Staples Credit Card be bill: You can expect an invoice to arrive toward the middle of the month.
Managing My Account.Can I pay my Staples Credit Card bill on: Staples offers multiple payment options, including an online bill pay option. For more information, visit the Staples Credit Center.
Managing My Account.I lost my receipt or invoice. Is there a: Your order history is always available at staples.com, giving you an easy way to print out your invoices and track your purchases. In store, if you paid by credit or debit card, just bring in that card and we'll be able to look up your receipt for you.
Managing My Account.Why is the order history on my Web site:
When you place an order with staples.com, the actual order that's shipped to you may be slightly different than what was ordered initially. (For example, an item you ordered may be temporarily out of stock, and the rest of the order was shipped without it.) The packing slip that's sent with your order is an accurate record of what was shipped and what was billed to you.
If you need additional information, please contact us. You can select "Order History/Packing Slips," and tell us what information you need. We can send you the information via email, confirm information over the phone, and/or send you replacement packing slips via fax for any delivery order that is placed with Staples.

Staples Rewards Program.What are the benefits of the Staples Rew:
As a Staples Rewards member, you earn up to 5% back in rewards on everything, except postage stamps, phone/gift cards and savings passes. You can use your rewards like cash to make purchases at Staples and staples.com®. Plus, you’ll get free shipping on your staples.com orders  over $14.99 (excluding Oversized items). In addition, you earn $2 back in rewards for every ink or toner cartridge you recycle when you've spent at least $30 on ink or toner over the previous 180 days. Rewards members can recycle up to 20 cartridges per month, depending on membership tier.
Base Rewards membersAs a Staples Rewards member, you receive 2% back in Rewards on all items excluding taxes, postage, prepaid phone cards, delivery charges, coupons, gift cards and purchases made on third-party Web sites.
Rewards Plus membersAs a Staples Rewards Plus member, you receive 3% back in Rewards on all items excluding taxes, postage, prepaid phone cards, delivery charges, coupons, gift cards and purchases made on third-party Web sites.
Rewards Premier membersAs a Staples Rewards Premier member, you receive 5% back in Rewards on all items excluding taxes, postage, prepaid phone cards, delivery charges, coupons, gift cards and purchases made on third-party Web sites.
Visit the Staples Rewards home page for a full list of benefits.
Staples Rewards Program.Is there a cost to join the Staples Rewa: No, there is not. The Staples Rewards program is available only to Staples® customers in the U.S., 18 years of age or older, with a valid U.S. mailing address and email address. Rewards are only granted for purchases made in the U.S. The Staples Rewards program is not available to Staples Advantage® customers or Staples employees.
Staples Rewards Program.How do I earn Staples Rewards?:
Simply place an order online (make sure your Rewards number is part of your staples.com account), or make a purchase in a Staples retail store and provide the cashier with your Rewards number when checking out. For any purchase you make (excluding postage stamps, phone/gift cards, savings passes), you earn up to 5% back in rewards.
Staples Rewards® are issued online monthly at staples.comewards in increments of $5. Monthly balances of less than $5 will roll over through the end of the following calendar quarter. Unissued Rewards will expire at the end of the following calendar quarter unless a Qualifying Purchase is made during that rollover period. Rewards are issued online to Members within approximately 30 days after the end of the month when the required minimum has been earned in the month. Rewards expire the last day of the month following the month in which they are issued and cannot be redeemed after the expiration date.
Staples Rewards Program.How will I receive my rewards?:
The quickest and easiest way to receive your rewards is electronically via email; just make sure we have your correct email address. (Log in to staples.com to check and/or update it now.) With electronic rewards, we’ll send you an email letting you know when you have rewards available.
All eligible rewards, including standard and Ink Recycling Rewards, are issued monthly online.   Once logged in to staples.com, access your available rewards by clicking on Staples Rewards in the Your Account dropdown at the top of the page, or access them from your Shopping Cart by simply clicking on “Add/edit coupons and rewards.”
If you’d prefer to receive your rewards via postal mail instead of email, please visit your Rewards Account Profile and select that option.
Staples Rewards Program.How often are rewards issued?: Rewards are issued monthly to members within approximately 30 days after the end of the calendar month when the value of the reward is at least $5.
Staples Rewards Program.I'm not currently a Staples Rewards memb: To enroll in Staples Rewards, please visit our rewards home page at www.staples.comewards.
Staples Rewards Program.How will I know how close I am to receiv: Once logged in to your account, you can view a summary of your rewards, including how close you are to earning your next reward, available rewards, and your store, online and phone purchase history. You can also get credit for missing purchases and enjoy many other great features.
Staples Rewards Program.Can I print my reward from my account?:
You can print your available rewards when logged into staples.com by clicking on Staples Rewards in the Your Account dropdown at the top of the page, then clicking Print next to the reward you want to print.
If you don't have a printer available, you can print rewards in our retail stores at the Special Orders computer or use your mobile device to access your rewards from the Staples Mobile App.
Staples Rewards Program.How do I get free shipping as a rewards: Staples Rewards members receive free shipping on orders over $14.99 on staples.com (excluding Oversize items) as well as those made by phone or from an in-store kiosk, as long as a membership number has been provided. (Note: This does not include orders made at documents.staples.com, print.staples.com, staplespromotionalproducts.com and third-party Web sites linked to Staples.com.) Be sure to include your rewards number in your online profile at staples.com or provide your rewards number to the Customer Service Representative when placing your order.
Staples Rewards Program.I forgot to provide my rewards number wh:
To add a missed purchase to your rewards account, log in to your staples.com account, click on Staples Rewards in the Your Account dropdown at the top of the page, then click on the “Add Receipt” link under Quick Links on the right-hand side of the page.
If your purchase was made in a Staples retail store, enter the 17-digit barcoded number at the bottom of your receipt.
If it was a phone or online order, enter the 10-digit order number and 6-digit shipment number. The shipment number is the number of boxes that were shipped for that order. For example, if you were shipped two boxes for one order, enter the order number and enter 000001 in the shipment number field for box one, enter the same order number and enter 000002 for box two. Continue this process for each box in your shipment. A maximum of 10 submissions will be accepted per day per customer. Purchases are applied to your account within five days after they have been validated. Purchases from the prior two calendar quarters can be submitted for validation.
Staples Rewards Program.Do Staples Rewards expire?: Yes. The expiration date is printed on the reward. Expired rewards cannot be reissued.
Staples Rewards Program.How do I view the full Terms and Conditi: Please visit our Rewards home page at www.staples.comewards  to view the full Terms and Conditions of the Staples Rewards program.
Staples Rewards Program.What happens if I don't use my entire re:
If a reward is not redeemed in full, on in-store purchases only, a one-time-only coupon will be printed on the bottom of your receipt for any remaining balance of $1.00 or more. The coupon will have the same expiration date as the original reward.
The balance coupon can be used in any one of our Staples stores, or when ordering by phone or online at staples.com.
All staples.com orders or phone orders, excluding taxes, delivery charges, prepaid phone cards and postage stamps, must meet or exceed the value of your reward.
Staples Rewards Program.How do I add a reward to an online order:
Just follow these directions to use your reward at staples.com:
1. When you're ready to submit your order, click Cart in the top right corner of the page
2. After you’ve reviewed your items, select Add/Edit Coupons
3. Select Add to Order next to the reward(s) you would apply to your order
4. Click Add Coupon
Don't forget: Your order will only process as long as the order, excluding taxes, delivery charges, prepaid phone cards and postage stamps, exceeds the value of your reward.
Staples Rewards Program.My staples.com order was shipped from an: Yes you do. Members get up to 5% back in rewards in store and online, even on items shipped from one of our trusted suppliers.
Staples Rewards Program.I joined the Staples Rewards program tod: Unfortunately, you cannot. You can only earn rewards for the purchases you make while you’re a member.
Staples Rewards Program.I received a Staples Rewards® coupon aft: Unfortunately, we can only apply Staples Rewards coupons at the time of your order and cannot do so later.
Staples Rewards Program.I used my Staples Rewards® earnings on a: Not to worry; as long as the original reward has not expired, you won't lose your rewards earnings. If you need to complete a full order return or specific item return, the check amount, which was prorated against the returned item, will be sent back to you in the form of a refund coupon. This coupon may be used for a future order with Staples.
Staples Rewards Program.Do I earn Staples Rewards on Staples pro: Yes, if you are a Staples Rewards member and the item you purchased is eligible for rewards.
Staples Rewards Program.Is there a higher tier of rewards member: Yes. Spend $500 or more in a calendar year, and you’ll be upgraded to Staples Rewards Plus status. Taxes, postage stamps, delivery charges, prepaid phone cards, Staples gift cards, purchases made on third-party Web sites, third-party gift cards and any other categories Staples has excluded do not count toward achieving Plus status.
Staples Rewards Program.What are the additional benefits for Plu: In addition to earning 3% back in Staples Rewards and free shipping on staples.com (exclusions apply), Plus members receive double the ink recycling limit and savings on Copy & Print and EasyTech services.
Staples Rewards Program.How do I earn Premier rewards status?: Spend $1,000 or more in a calendar year, and you’ll be upgraded to Staples Rewards Premier status. Taxes, postage stamps, delivery charges, prepaid phone cards, Staples gift cards, purchases made on third-party Web sites, third-party gift cards and any other categories Staples has excluded do not count toward achieving Premier status.
Staples Rewards Program.What are the additional benefits for Pre: In addition to earning 5% back in Staples Rewards and free shipping on staples.com (exclusions apply), Premier members also receive double the ink recycling limit savings on EasyTech and Copy & Print services, Premier-exclusive bonus events, additional savings opportunities and more.
Staples Rewards Program.Can I earn Staples Rewards® for each ink:
Staples Rewards members receive $2 back in Staples Rewards for every eligible cartridge recycled in person in a Staples® store or online at staplesrewards.com — up to 10 per calendar month for regular members and up to 20 for Plus and Premier members — if the member has spent at least $30 in ink and/or toner purchases at Staples over the previous 180 days.
Ink and/or toner purchases made on the date of recycling are calculated toward the minimum purchase requirement. Minimum purchase requirement does not include coupons, taxes or shipping charges.
Limit one Staples Rewards account per person or at any mailing address. Additional accounts will be canceled. Ink resellers and remanufacturers are strictly prohibited from earning Ink Recycling Rewards
Staples Rewards Program.Can I recycle ink and toner cartridges a: Yes, you can. Click here and select Get Started to recycle your ink or toner cartridge online. You will receive a prepaid shipping label that you can use to send back cartridges. (Note: Online ink and toner recycling is currently available only for Staples Rewards members.)
Staples Rewards Program.Are ink recycling rewards included in my: No, they are not. Ink recycling rewards are issued monthly, separately from your standard Staples Rewards statement.
Staples Rewards Program.Do I earn Staples Rewards on Staples pro: Yes, if you are a Staples Rewards member and the item you purchased is eligible for rewards.
Staples Rewards Program.I'm a teacher. Are there any additional:
There are. In addition to up to 5% back in rewards and free shipping on every staples.com order, you’ll receive 10% back in rewards on teaching and art supplies. Get automatically upgraded to Teacher Rewards Premier when you spend $1,000 or more annually, and enjoy all the benefits of Premier Rewards membership in addition to Teacher Rewards.
Teacher Rewards membersAs a Teacher Rewards member, you receive 2% back in Rewards on all items excluding taxes, postage, prepaid phone cards, delivery charges, coupons, gift cards and purchases made on third-party Web sites. Teacher rewards members also receive 10% back in rewards on teaching and art supplies.
Teacher Rewards Premier membersAs a Teacher Rewards Premier member, you receive 5% back in Rewards on all items excluding taxes, postage, prepaid phone cards, delivery charges, coupons, gift cards and purchases made on third-party Web sites. Teacher Premier rewards members also receive 10% back in rewards on teaching and art supplies.
Staples Rewards Program.What is the Reward A Classroom program a:
The Reward A Classroom program is a great way parents and teachers can work together to keep classrooms stocked all year long. In addition to the up to 5% back in rewards all members earn, parents can earn extra rewards for the teacher of their choice with the Reward A Classroom program.
Here's what teachers get when parents shop:

2% back in rewards on everything, excluding postage, phone/gift cards and savings passes
5% back in rewards on every Staples® Copy & Print purchase

Note: Teachers can earn up to $50 from as many as 40 parents each year. That's as much as $2,000 back in rewards every year.
Staples Rewards Program.Are there any bonus events for rewards m:
Rewards members get access to special savings opportunities throughout the year.

Bonus events: All members are eligible for special rewards back promotional offerings such as 100% back in rewards on batteries or double ink recycling rewards with minimum purchase requirements. Check out our Weekly Ad for these limited-time extra savings.
Premier-exclusive bonus events: Premier members will receive exclusive offers a few times per year. These will be available on the Bonus Events page and Coupon Wallet.
Staples Rewards Program.Can you tell me more about the additiona:
Plus and Premier members get double the ink recycling limit – up to 20 cartridges per month.  Rewards members earn $2 back in rewards for every ink or toner cartridge recycle when they’ve spent $30 on ink or toner over the previous 180 days.
Plus and Premier members both get Free Copy & Print services in store: Plus members receive $25 to spend annually, and Premier members receive $50 to spend annually.
Both Plus and Premier Members receive Free PC diagnostic and tech support in store:  Plus members get a free diagnostic service for their hardware or software, and  Premier members get a free diagnostic + $20 towards EasyTech Total Support.
Visit the Rewards Home Page for a full list of member benefits
Staples Rewards Program.The login information I used to use to a: We’ve put all your Staples Rewards information including available rewards, account profile and ink & toner cartridge recycling on staples.com to make it easy. Now just use your staples.com login information to access everything. Don’t have a staples.com login? Click here to register for one.
Staples Rewards Program.How do I add my rewards number to my Sta: To change your name, company name, address or telephone number, log in to your staples.com account, click on Staples Rewards in the Your Account dropdown at the top of the page, then click on the “View rewards account profile” link on the left hand side of the page.  Any changes you make to your profile can take up to 48 hours to update.
Staples Rewards Program.How do I change the name, company name,: To change your name, company name, address or telephone number, log in to your staples.com account, click on Staples Rewards in the Your Account dropdown at the top of the page, then click on the “View rewards account profile” link on the left hand side of the page.  Any changes you make to your profile can take up to 48 hours to update.
Staples Rewards Program.Why should I give Staples my email addre: We recommend that you use your email address as your username. If you choose to receive your rewards electronically, we’ll email you a notification when your rewards are available. If you choose to receive your rewards electronically and do not provide an email address, we won’t be able to notify you when your rewards are ready.
Staples Rewards Program.How can I get another Staples Rewards ca:
In an effort to make things easier for you, we no longer require you to show your Staples Rewards card when shopping at a Staples retail store. Just give the cashier your phone number when you check out. This will ensure your purchases track to your rewards account and you'll have one less card to carry in your wallet.

Customer Care & Feedback.What are \"cookies,\" and how do they af:
The quick and easy answer is that cookies are small files stored on your computer or mobile device that identify you to our site and help us to give you a more personalized shopping experience (it’s how we remember what’s in your shopping cart, for example). Most browsers are set by default to accept cookies automatically; however, your browser may have been configured not to accept cookies.
In order to shop or register on staples.com®, you must be able to accept cookies. Follow these instructions. If you don't see your Web browser listed, please refer to the browser’s Help function.
Instructions may vary based on platform, browser and browser version. These instructions are approximate. For exact instructions, refer to your browser's help file or your browser's manufacturer.
Microsoft® Internet Explorer 6.x or higher, Windows®
1. On the Tools menu, click Internet Options
2. On the Privacy tab, move the slider to Low or Accept All Cookies
3. Click OK
Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.x, Windows
1. On the Tools menu, click Internet Options
2. On the Security tab, click the Custom Level button
3. Scroll down to the Cookies section
4. Set "Allow cookies that are stored on your computer" to "Enable"
5. Set "Allow per-session cookies" to "Enable"
6. Click OK
Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.x, Macintosh
1. On the Explorer menu, select Preferences
2. Under the Receiving Files option, select Cookies
3. Under "When receiving cookies:" select Never Ask
4. Click OK
Safari
1. On the Safari menu, click Preferences
2. Click the Security icon
3. In the Accept Cookies selection box, choose Always
4. Close the security window
Mozilla
1. On the Edit menu, click Preferences
2. In the Privacy & Security category, choose Cookies
3. Click the radio button next to "Enable all cookies"
4. Click OK
Firefox
1. On the Tools menu, click Options
2. Select the Privacy category
3. Expand the Cookies options on the right
4. Select Enable Cookies
5. Click OK
