Policies & Legal.Staples' U.S. Privacy Policy:
Effective Date: April 21, 2014
This Privacy Statement applies to the handling of your Personal Information in connection with all services and Web sites offered by Staples.
This Privacy Statement describes:

Why we collect Personal Information
What Personal Information we collect and when it is collected
How your Personal Information is used and protected
When and with whom your Personal Information is shared
How to contact us with questions or comments 


Information We Collect. This Privacy Statement applies to Personal Information, which is information that Staples collects from you as a customer that specifically identifies you as an individual.
Staples may collect your Personal Information when you:

Place an order from our catalog or on Staples.com or other Staples Web sites
Create an account on Staples.com or other Staples Web sites
Make a purchase at one of our retail stores
Return an item, make an exchange or submit a rebate
Inquire about our products or services or contact customer service
Request our catalog
Receive a Staples gift package
Sign up for Staples email or text-message updates or other promotional materials
Enter a Staples contest or sweepstakes
Are referred to us through a marketing promotion
Participate in a marketing survey, promotion or event
Apply for a Staples credit card

Personal Information that Staples collects from you may include:

Name
Address
Telephone number
Fax number
Email address
Transaction information
Credit card, debit card or checking account information
Driver's license number and expiration date (in conjunction with merchandise returns or credit checks for credit card applications)
Date of birth (in conjunction with promotions, credit card applications or credit checks)
Social Security Number (in conjunction with credit card applications)
Employment history (in conjunction with credit card applications)

Staples may also collect other information, including browsing activity on Staples Web sites, activity in response to Staples emails, location information, and aggregated or statistical information regarding use of our Web sites to improve site performance, product offerings, and promotions and targeted advertising. If you do not want to receive targeted advertising from Staples, please see the Cookies section below. If you do not want to receive email or other mail from us, please see the Choices section below.
Note: In order to provide you with a better shopping experience and to improve the quality of our services, we may combine Personal Information you submit under your account with other information that we may receive from you, from third parties or with other public information. We maintain this information, along with a record of your purchases, in restricted databases.
Some services provided by Staples require us to become temporary custodians of customers’ equipment, such as personal computers, that may contain Personal Information. It is Staples’ policy not to retain such information from customer equipment once the requested services are complete.
Staples does not knowingly collect Personal Information from children younger than 13.
How We Use the Information We Collect. Staples strives to make your shopping experience easy and convenient, from your initial search for products and services through the delivery of your requested items. The information we collect helps us meet this goal by allowing us to:

Customize your shopping experience and identify your preferences
Confirm, process, fulfill, and track your orders
Respond to your customer service inquiries or requests
Inform you of special values and featured items 
Send you catalogs or promotional offers we believe will be of interest to you
Serve you targeted advertising
Send you Staples email and text-message updates
Inform you of recalls or other information on products you have purchased
Prevent or mitigate fraud and credit risk
Administer promotions, contests, sweepstakes, and rewards programs
Administer Staples credit cards
Improve our merchandise selection, Web sites, retail experience and customer service
Comply with applicable legal demands, laws and regulations

California Residents – Notice of Disclosure. California law gives California residents the right to request a notice describing the categories of Personal Information Staples shares with affiliated companies or other parties for their direct marketing purposes.
The notice that Staples gives California residents under California Civil Code sections 1798.83–1798.84 identifies the categories of Personal Information Staples shares with affiliated companies or others for their direct marketing purposes. The notice includes the names and addresses of those affiliated companies or others. If you are a California resident and would like a copy of this notice, please email us at privacy@staples.com or write to us at:
Privacy and ComplianceStaples500 Staples DriveFramingham, MA 01702
EU Countries and Switzerland – Safe Harbor. The U.S. Department of Commerce has set forth the U.S.–EU Safe Harbor Framework and the U.S.–Swiss Safe Harbor Framework regarding the collection, use, and retention of Personal Information from EU member countries and Switzerland. Staples adheres to these Safe Harbor Frameworks, as well as to the Safe Harbor Privacy Principles of notice, choice, onward transfer, security, data integrity, access, and enforcement. To learn more about the Safe Harbor program, and to view Staples' certification status in the U.S.–EU Safe Harbor List and the U.S.–Swiss Safe Harbor List, visit http://export.gov/safeharbor. To learn more about the Safe Harbor Privacy Principles, visit http://export.gov/safeharbor/eu/eg_main_018475.asp.
Use of “Cookies.” Cookies are pieces of information that are transferred from Web sites to your computer’s hard drive and they may serve a variety of purposes (web beacons, Flash cookies and other similar technologies may also be used for these purposes). For example, cookies “remember” you when you return to Staples.com or other Staples Web sites and make your experience more user-friendly. Cookies help Staples identify which Staples web pages are visited and how often and evaluate how its Web sites are used to improve their services.
Cookies also enable Staples and third parties to deliver targeted advertising to you. To learn how to opt out of these advertising-related cookies, click here. You can also opt-out of receiving personalized ads from third party advertisers and ad networks who are members of the Digital Advertising Alliance or the Network Advertising Initiative by visiting their opt-out pages. If your browsers are configured to reject cookies when you visit these pages, or if you subsequently erase your cookies, use a different device or change web browsers, your opt-out may become ineffective and may need to be repeated. Browser settings, including do not track signals and other mechanisms, will not affect data collection and not constitute an opt-out of advertising-related cookies, personalized third-party advertising or promotional messages from Staples; you must use the opt-out choices described herein in order to opt out from such promotional messages.
Your Choices Regarding Staples Promotional Messages. You may decide to opt out of receiving promotional messages from Staples. To do so, please notify us by one of the following means:

Follow the “unsubscribe” link on any promotional email from Staples 
Email us at customerprofilemgmt@staples.com and tell us what marketing programs you want to opt-out of from Staples
Click here to fill out our Web-based form
Call us toll-free at 800-333-3330
Fax the back page of your Staples Catalog or direct mail piece address block (with your instructions to be removed on it) to us toll free at 877-333-0398 
Write to us at Staples Direct Marketing Services, 500 Staples Drive, Framingham, MA 01702 (please note that an opt-out request sent by postal mail may take at least sixty (60) days to become effective)
To opt out of Staples text messages, send the word STOP to 555444

Once Staples has processed your request, you may continue to receive messages or postal mail from affiliated companies and others if they received your email, mobile number or postal address from Staples previously, from sources other than Staples or through their own transactions or communications with you. You will also continue to receive promotional messages if you later request to hear from us again.
Information Sharing. Staples may share your Personal Information with third parties in the following instances:

We may provide your Personal Information to third parties to process this information on our behalf. We require that these parties agree to process this information based on our instructions and requirements consistent with this Privacy Statement. 
We may disclose your Personal Information to: (a) satisfy applicable law, regulations, legal process or valid governmental request; (b) enforce applicable Terms of Service, including investigation of potential violations of Terms of Service; (c) detect, prevent or mitigate fraud or security or technical issues; or (d) protect against imminent harm to the rights, property or safety of Staples, its customers or the public as required or permitted by law.
We may disclose some elements of your Personal Information to third parties to notify you of offers or services that may be of interest to you. We do not share credit card or other financial information for marketing purposes. 
We may disclose Personal Information to third parties in connection with a merger, acquisition or sale (including any transfers made as part of insolvency or bankruptcy proceedings) involving Staples or its affiliated companies or as part of a corporate reorganization, stock or asset sale, or other change in corporate control.
We may also disclose to third parties aggregated or other information that does not identify you individually, such as how many customers viewed a particular product or web page, to conduct website analytics or to serve you targeted advertising.

Third-Party Web Sites. Staples.com and other Staples Web sites may contain links to, or plugins or widgets from, social media or other sites operated and maintained by third parties, over which we have no control. Privacy practices on such sites may be different from our Privacy Statement. Similarly, Staples.com and other Staples websites may be accessed and used from third-party sites that we do not control. Staples encourages you to consult the privacy policies that govern such sites before using them.
Information Security. Staples maintains reasonable and appropriate standards to safeguard your Personal Information.
When you enter Personal Information that contains a Social Security Number, driver's license number or credit or debit card number at the designated and secured sections of Staples.com or other Staples websites, the site encrypts or encodes the information when sending it over the Internet. Personal Information that we collect and maintain is subject to physical, administrative, and technical controls that are consistent with recognized industry standards.
Staples processes Personal Information on our servers in the United States and in other countries. In some cases, we may process your Personal Information on a server outside your own country in accordance with this Privacy Statement and applicable law.
Avoiding Identity Theft. If you think someone has improperly accessed or used your Personal Information supplied to Staples or made unauthorized purchases at Staples using your Personal Information, please contact us immediately.
Consider taking the following steps to protect yourself against fraud and identity theft:
Review your account statements regularly. Carefully review your bank, credit card, and other account statements every month to ensure that all of your account activity is valid. Report any questionable charges promptly and in writing to the card or account issuer.
Review your credit report from time to time. Obtain and review your credit report periodically to ensure that all your information is correct. You can obtain a free credit report once per year by visiting http://www.annualcreditreport.com or by calling 877-322-8228. Carefully reviewing your credit report can help you spot problems and address them quickly. If you have any questions about your credit report or notice any inaccuracies, contact the relevant consumer reporting agency promptly at the telephone number listed on the report.
Create a fraud alert. Consider placing a fraud alert on your credit file. The fraud alert prompts creditors to contact you before opening any new accounts or increasing credit limits on your existing accounts. You can place a fraud alert on your credit file by contacting one of three consumer reporting agencies listed below. You need to contact only one of the three agencies in order to create the alert; the agency you contact is required by law to contact the other two. You will receive confirmation letters in the mail and then will be able to order a credit report from each of the three agencies, free of charge. The fraud alert will remain in your credit file for at least 90 days.

For more guidance on steps you can take to protect your information and credit, contact the U.S. Federal Trade Commission by email at http://www.consumer.ftc.gov/features/feature-0014-identity-theft or by telephone at 877-ID-THEFT (877-438-4338), or write to the Commission at:
Identity Theft Clearinghouse Federal Trade Commission600 Pennsylvania Avenue NW Washington, D.C. 20580
Changes to Your Personal Information. To help ensure that the Personal Information we store and process is accurate, complete and current, please contact us with changes to your Personal Information by one of the means described in the section about Your Choices Regarding Staples Promotional Messages above.
Unless otherwise required by law or for legitimate business purposes, we will make good-faith efforts to correct your Personal Information when you notify us of an error or a change. We reserve the right to charge a small fee to process any request to update, correct or delete Personal Information. We also may decline to process certain requests that require a disproportionate technical or practical cost or effort or that could jeopardize the privacy of others or infringe upon Staples’ rights or property.

Upon receiving a written complaint from a customer, Staples contacts the customer directly. We will investigate your complaint promptly and diligently to address your concerns and to resolve any dispute quickly.

Staples will post on Staples.com and its other Web sites all changes to the Privacy Statement, and, if the changes are significant, will provide a more prominent notice of the Privacy Statement change. To Sign Up for Staples Alerts: Send a text message that says STAPLES to 555-444. Staples will reply with a text message containing a link and a request for more information. By providing your phone number and pressing Sign Up, you consent to receive Staples text message at the phone number designated (up to 6 text messages per month). Texts may be sent via automatic telephone dialing system. Your consent to receive text messages does not mean you are obligated to make a purchase.
To Stop the Programs: To stop messages from Staples coming to your phone, you can opt out of the program via SMS. To stop our text deals alerts, just send a text message that says STOP to 555-444.
You will be removed from all Staples SMS programs after a one-time cancel confirmation, and won’t receive any future messages after that unless you opt back in.
The Staples Mobile Program is compatible with Alltel, AT&T, Boost, Cellular South, MetroPCS, Midwest Wireless, nTelos, Sprint, Suncom, T-Mobile, Verizon Wireless and Virgin Mobile. To participate, the recipient's phone needs to be text messaging–enabled. We try to make it so everyone can participate, but depending on your carrier, plan and phone, we can't guarantee it will work for you.
Cost to Participate: Although Staples' Mobile Programs are complimentary and require no purchase or fee for participation, message and data rates may apply. Check your mobile plan for more details. Subscribers will receive up to the specified number of alerts per program each month.
Staples One-Time Deals Query: You will receive 1 message per request.
Staples Alerts: You will receive up to 6 messages per month.
Staples Daily Deals Alerts: You will receive up to 31 messages per month.
Questions: You can send a text message from your mobile phone with the word HELP to 555-444 at any time, or call us at 800-333-3330. We can answer any questions you have about the program.

Buy Online Pick Up In Store.How long do I have to pick up my order?: Your order will be available at the store you choose for 5 days after you receive confirmation that your order is ready for pickup
Buy Online Pick Up In Store.Can I have someone pick up my order for: Yes, you can assign an alternate person to pick up your order during the checkout process in the Store Pick Up Information Section. Simply provide their name and telephone number. You will also need to forward the “Ready for Pickup” email to this person. They will need to provide this email and a valid ID at the time of pickup.
Buy Online Pick Up In Store.Can I select the Buy Online and Pick Up: Yes! Just download the Staples App and search for products with Pick up in store today radio dial.
Buy Online Pick Up In Store.Can I choose to Buy Online and Pick Up I: Of course! After you place all your items in the shopping cart, use the radio dials at the item-level to determine pickup or shipping options at checkout. For example, you can ship one item to your home or business and pick up the others in store.

Auto Restock.Staples Auto Restock Terms of Use:
Welcome to the Staples Auto Restock program (“Auto ReAuto”) Terms of Use (the “Terms of Use”).  The Staples Auto Restock is operated by Staples Contract & Commercial, Inc. (together with its affiliated entities, “Staples”).  Your participation in Auto Restock is governed by these Terms of Use, as well as the Staples.com Terms and Conditions (in the event of any conflict between these Terms of Use and the Staples.com Terms and Conditions, these Terms of Use shall control).  Please read these Terms of Use carefully, because they constitute a legal agreement between you and Staples.  By registering in Staples Auto Restock, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms of Use.  If you do not agree to these Terms of Use, please terminate your use of Auto Restock.  Staples reserves the right to change these Terms of Use.  You should check these Terms of Use periodically - by using Auto Restock after we post changes to these Terms of Use, you agree to accept those changes, whether or not you actually reviewed them.  These Terms of Use were last updated on 4/15/15. 
ELIGIBILITY
Your Auto Restock is personal to you, and you may not assign or transfer your Auto Restock subscriptions, or any of its benefits, to any third party without Staples’ authorization. If any problems arise with your Auto Restock account, you will be notified through your email address provided with your Auto Restock subscription.  If continuing problems arise, your Auto Restock order will be canceled and no additional Auto Restock orders will be shipped until the problem has been resolved. If your particular Auto Restock order is canceled, your enrollment with Staples’ Auto Restock will remain in effect, and Staples will attempt to process the next Auto Restock order based on the delivery frequency you have chosen.
If an item is no longer available, or no longer eligible for Auto Restock, we will automatically suspend your subscription for that item and no additional orders with that subscription will be placed.  If you choose to replace the item, you will be required to create a new subscription order for that item
BENEFITS
Your enrollment begins after your first order. Your order will be based on the specific date you chose for your first order. If you did not specify a date for your order, your order will be processed immediately by Staples. 
Staples reserves the right to change the Auto Restock benefits at any time in its sole discretion.  All changes will apply to future orders, including the current subscriptions.
PAYMENTS AND BILLING CONDITIONS
A valid credit card is required at the time of the order, and will be used for payments of subsequent Auto Restock orders.
The total cost charged to your credit card for each Auto Restock order will be the cost of the item on the day that order is processed (plus delivery charges and sales tax, if applicable).  Therefore, the cost of each Auto Restock order may vary.
After your first order, Staples will send you an email notice prior to processing each Auto Restock order to confirm the cost of the order. Your initial order will be processed when your subscription is set up. You can also view the order date, order number and total of each Auto Restock order by visiting “My Subscriptions” on your staples.com® account. The amount of each Auto Restock order will be billed to the credit card you authorize for Auto Restock purchases, and your card will be billed on the day your order is shipped.
If the method of payment used during the subscription period becomes invalid or if the charge is otherwise rejected, an email will be sent to the email address associated with your subscription notifying you that the next subscription will be on hold.
Unless you update your method of payment, the charge for each order will be billed to the method of payment used when you create your subscription. If the method of payment becomes invalid at any time during the subscription period or if the charge is otherwise rejected, we will send an email to the email address associated with your subscription notifying you that the subscription has been placed on hold.
CHANGES, CANCELATION AND RENEWAL OF SUBSCRIPTION
You can change or cancel your subscription any time before the current order has shipped in “My Auto Restock Orders” on staples.com.  Your subscription will remain in effect until it is canceled.  To prevent additional shipments of an Auto Restock order, you must cancel or change your subscription within 24 hours before the next subscription order is shipped.   You will only be charged for orders that have already processed for delivery.
ELIGIBLE ITEMS
Auto Restock is limited to items displaying the Auto Restock message.
TERMINATION POLICY
Staples may, in its sole discretion, terminate or suspend your subscription, for any reason, including, without limitation, breach of these Terms of Use. In the event that you are not satisfied with the subscriptions provided by Staples, your sole remedy is to terminate your use of Auto Restock.  If we choose to do so, you will only be charged for orders that have been shipped to you
Auto Restock.What is Staples’ Auto Restock?: Auto Restock allows you to shop for items that Staples offers that you never want to run out of. It is delivered to you on the schedule you set.
Auto Restock.How do I sign up?: Sign in with your Staples.com account. You can find Auto Restock skus using search term such as restock SKU_Name.   You can add the items that are eligible to your account.  Select the frequency of how often items are delivered.  After you submit your order, you will receive a confirmation email.
Auto Restock.Do I need to have a staples.com account?: Yes, if you do not have a staples.com account, you can sign up at www.staples.com/office/suppliesegistration.
Auto Restock.What are the benefits of Staples Auto Re: You will never run out of your favorite items.
Auto Restock.Can I remove an item from my subscriptio: Yes, by going to My Auto Restock Orders and Edit Delivery.
Auto Restock.How do I change a delivery date?: You can update from My Auto Restock Orders.
Auto Restock.How do I change an item order frequency: You can update from My Auto Restock Orders.
Auto Restock.What happens if an item on my subscripti: If an item in your subscription is out of stock, we will notify you by email.
Auto Restock.Can I return items from my subscription?: Returns will be treated like any other staples.com return. You can bring your item to any Staples® retail store, even if you ordered it online or by catalog. If you're unable to go to a store, we also offer convenient online returns; simply click on "Return an Item" above or feel free to call Staples Customer Service at 800-333-3330.
Auto Restock.Why did the price of my subscription cha: The amount of each subscription order may vary. The price of your first subscription order will be confirmed when you enroll. After your first order, we confirm the price of the subscription item via email confirming your subscription order, plus any sales tax.
Auto Restock.When will I be charged?: You will be charged when your order is shipped. For your first Auto Restock order, the price of your order will be confirmed and you will be charged immediately. After your first Auto Restock order, we will send an email before it is scheduled to ship.
Auto Restock.Can I skip an order?: You may skip an order 24 hours before an order is placed.
Auto Restock.Why can’t I skip an order?: The order has already been processed in our system and the window to skip that order has passed.
Auto Restock.How will I know when my order has been s: We will send you an email confirmation to let you know when it's been shipped.
Auto Restock.How can I check on my order’s delivery s: To check the delivery status of your order, visit the Order Status page on staples.com and type in your order number and zip code. You can also log into staples.com, click on "Track Order" in the top right corner of the page and select the appropriate order for tracking information. We cannot determine exact delivery time, but we can tell you if your order has been shipped, and whether any problems with it have been reported to us.  Order ID and Subscription ID are different and you can track an order only with an order ID.  For more specific delivery details, please refer to your order.
Auto Restock.Why did Staples cancel my subscription?: Staples will cancel your subscription if the item is no longer eligible for Auto Restock or the item has been discontinued or changed. If you'd like to subscribe to a different item, please view eligible Auto Restock items.  Orders can also be cancelled when there are problems with the credit card. If you have more questions, please contact Staples Customer Service at 800-333-3330.
Auto Restock.How do I cancel my subscription?: You can cancel your subscription anytime on your staples.com account by going to My Auto Restock Orders.
Auto Restock.How do I reenroll in my subscription?: You can reactivate your subscription anytime on your staples.com account by going to My Auto Restock Orders.
Auto Restock.What are the different ways I can pay fo:
We currently accept Staples® Credit Cards, Visa, MasterCard, Discover and American Express. We accept single or multiple methods of payment on your purchases online and at the kiosk. Staples maintains reasonable and appropriate standards to safeguard your Personal Information. We cannot accept cards issued outside the United States
You cannot pay for your Auto Restock orders with gift cards, rewards, rebate cards or through the Visa Checkout.
Auto Restock.Can I add more to a subscription?: Yes. Select the frequency of how often you want that item delivered. If you add this item 3 days before your next delivery, you can expect it with your next delivery. Otherwise, expect this item to be in the delivery after your next subscription.
